comment_text: That worker wearing the face mask is proving that the workers in this plant never wear this sort of stuff and only have it on to look less nasty for the cameras and for the owners to cover their asses. If they were actually required to wear such sanitary and safety gear every day all employees would know how to properly use the mask. As it is, no one present knew how to don a face mask properly, so no one ever noticed that the worker did not have their nose covered. This is a nasty, unsanitary plant to be creating beverages for human consumption. Nasty. Dirty.
oh good, this video has proper audio balancing
